verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G99999><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> should <S%G1163><s%> give more earnest <S%G4056><s%> heed <S%G4337><s%> to the things which we have heard <S%G191><s%>, lest at any time <S%G3379><s%> we should let them slip <S%G3901><s%>.
